prng.generator

Class HashSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • prng.generator.HashSpec

  • public class HashSpec
extends Object
    Specification for a Hash based RNG

    • Field Detail

      • SPEC_SHA1

        public static final HashSpec SPEC_SHA1
        Specification for SHA-1 based generator. The 440 bit seed length is the maximum number of bytes the SHA-1 algorithm can accept as a single block. The 440 bit input is padded with an 0x80 byte and a 64-bit message length value to create a 512-bit block.

      • SPEC_SHA256

        public static final HashSpec SPEC_SHA256
        Specification for SHA-256 based generator. The 440 bit seed length is the maximum number of bytes the SHA-256 algorithm can accept as a single block. The 440 bit input is padded with an 0x80 byte and a 64-bit message length value to create a 512-bit block.

      • SPEC_SHA512

        public static final HashSpec SPEC_SHA512
        Specification for SHA-512 based generator. The 888 bit seed length is the maximum number of bytes the SHA-512 algorithm can accept as a single block. The 888 bit input is padded with an 0x80 byte and a 128-bit message length value to create a 1024-bit block.

      • algorithm_

        final String algorithm_
        Name of the digest algorithm

      • outputLength_

        final int outputLength_
        Number of bytes in the digest output

      • provider_

        final Provider provider_
        Security provider, if needed

      • seedLength_

        final int seedLength_
        Number of seed bytes required by the algorithm

      • strength_

        final int strength_
        Effective security strength in bits
